aboutDescription: I'm a passionate individual who finds joy in life's simple and profound moments, from enjoying vibrant city life to cherishing heartfelt connections.
aboutCard1Description: I live in Mexico City and enjoy its vibrant culture and amazing food.
aboutCard2Description: I am a passionate fan of Formula 1, following every race with excitement.
aboutCard3Description: Spending quality time with friends is one of my favorite activities.
aboutCard4Description: I love attending music festivals and concerts to enjoy live performances.
aboutCard5Description: Cats are my favorite companions. Proud companion of a kitten for 15 years.
aboutCard6Description: I’m a fan of serious movies and can’t watch them without a bucket of popcorn.
aboutCard7Description: I’m living the most magical chapter of my life, alongside my wonderful fiancée.
aboutCard8Description: Programming is not just a job, but also my greatest passion.
aboutCard9Description: Exploring new places, cultures, and cuisines fills me with inspiration and excitement. Traveling fuels my soul.
skillsDescription: These are some of the technologies and tools I work with:
project1Description: E-Commerce platform with shopping cart and integrated payment system.
project2Description: Personal website designed to showcase my projects and skills.
project3Description: Blog application with user authentication and comment system.
projectsDescription: Here you can explore some of my featured projects:
resumeDescription: In this section, you can view my resume or download it in PDF format. This document details my professional experience, skills, education, and more.
privacyPolicyParagraph1: At hectormartil.dev, we are committed to protecting your privacy. This document details how we collect, use, and protect the information you share with us.
privacyPolicySection1Description: We may collect the following information:
privacyPolicySection1Item3: Subject and message content sent through our contact form
privacyPolicySection2Description: We use your data solely to:
privacyPolicySection2Item1: Respond to your inquiries or messages sent through the contact form
privacyPolicySection2Item2: Send notifications related to your inquiry
privacyPolicySection3Description: We implement security measures to protect your data. However, no system is completely secure, so we cannot guarantee absolute security.
privacyPolicySection4FinalSentence: You can exercise these rights by sending us an email at: hectormartilb@gmail.com.
privacyPolicySection5Description: We reserve the right to update this privacy policy. Any changes will be posted on this page.
privacyPolicyFinalParagraph: If you have any questions, contact us at hectormartilb@gmail.com.

validation.privacyConsentRequired: You must accept the Privacy Policy.

contactDescription: If you have any questions or proposals, feel free to send me a message through the contact form.
contact.successMessage: Form submitted successfully. We have sent a confirmation to your email.
contact.errorMessage: There was an error sending the form. Please try again.
